article.title: Bergeson Assigned to U.N. Command Korea
article.text: Maj. Gen. Thomas W. Bergeson, USAF, has been appointed to the rank of lieutenant general and assigned as deputy commander, U.N. Command Korea; deputy commander, U.S. Forces Korea; commander, Air Component Command, Republic of Korea/U.S. Combined Forces Command; and commander, 7th Air Force, Pacific Air Forces, Osan Air Base, South Korea.
